title: Day 1 in Gold V, I have yet to encounter any intelligent life
body:
The natives of this Rank appear to believe that copy paste "Pro" builds and KDA are all they need to win games.

Creep score appears to take priority over Objectives and remains a point of pride worth bragging about for the unintelligent beasts I've found.

Pings to contest Dragons and Barons go unanswered, requests to group down a lane to take free towers while the other lanes auto-push with minions are ignored.

I've yet to encounter any friendly tanks that build {{item:3512}} when behind so our towers don't suffer while they're off roaming through the Jg.

{{champion:157}} and {{champion:67}} players continue to ignore all common sense and insist on going solo into unwarded territory and seem compelled by some suicidal urge to go 1v3 against full health enemies.

I fear for the future.

replies.body:
Reporting in from Platinum Two.

The {{champion:67}} {{champion:157}} behavior has not changed, in fact, they're setting fire to the AllChat system. Flames everywhere. Mayday, I may need an Evac.

> [{quoted}](name=dDoSsnare,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TEvWIEW1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-12T18:15:06.544+0000)
>
> Reporting in from Platinum Two.
> 
> The {{champion:67}} {{champion:157}} behavior has not changed, in fact, they're setting fire to the AllChat system. Flames everywhere. Mayday, I may need an Evac.

Plat 2, this is Plat 5, we're mapping the points of egress now. State your LUNAR and we'll direct a RIT team to your location, over.

Plat 2, Plat 5, Gold 5, this is Silver 2 Actual reporting in. Full AD teams are going up against tanks not wearing {{item:3075}} and we're seeing consistent {{champion:53}} bans. The {{champion:157}} {{champion:92}} toxicity is reaching pandemic proportions. We also have friendly top laners losing their minds and continuously engaging their opponent at a two level deficit (I'll get 'em *this* time!).

Situation critical, activating Freelo Shyvana Jungle protocol. Late game Kayle Carry threat: Imminent. Our comp has no hard CC, ff@20
Bronze 5 reporting in--  chzzt... chzzt....
This is Placements. Where is my potato. I repeat. Where is my potato.
This is Placements.  My wifi is clearly trying to sabotage my games, because I'm dealing with a constant ping of 1000ms.  Anyone got an ethernet cable?
This is unranked. I deserve challenjour

Placements here, the feeding just got worse. Don't know what to do when the autofilled Support doesn't want to give the role to a Support main in the jungle. I fear the worst...

*Just between you and me, Platinum, I fear that Bronze V will eventually catch up with the Placement camps. Evacs might not be possible, old friend.*
Placements, I'm in the vicinity. My squad has not engaged yet and our provisions are plenty. We may have a potato to supply you with, please state your coordinates.
(static)
Bronze 3 {{champion:412}} reporting in - GRAB THE FUCKING LANTERN!!!!!!

Bronze 4 reporting in 
Supports are not using abilities... I fear my ship shall blow soon 
I repeat: supports are not using abilities

How about LeBlanc ADC and alister AP build supports. Mages like annie in top lane and cait as jungler. 

Please send help. PLEASE.

Also the people who stopped playing after they hit a certain rank last season coming back and not reading about all the changes in .22. OMG PLEASE!!
No jungler, I repeat NO JUNGLER!  Mayday mayday, we have 3 top and no one mid.  The double bruiser bot lane is already 0/3, jungle camps haven't even spawned!  I need an evac from Balsa wood 5.

I just had a troll Camille player who in turn actually did well top, but our top laner also went top and fed, afk'd. I was solo bot and kept killing their Jinx, their jungler just decided to stay bot of the map at that point. GG SWAIN
Your top laner ALSO went top? HERESY!

The actual top laner who got top, 2 top is new meta :-)



If it was support top I would actually like that.
Yeah, something a little different in the meta here and there can't hurt :P
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/df/df99b19b709a115b19ff9d24427c026637ae213cbd36989ec4ef3165e778f296.jpg

From my experience when I was in that elo, gold players think winning team fights is everything. They don't care much about objectives, they think that by forcing and winning fights they will win the game.
Win team fight shop immediately repeat.

Wait 'til you get to Plat IV

I've seen...things...

You mean...

There's no light at the end of the Bronze Tunnel?

> [{quoted}](name=Spice POWAH,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TEvWIEW1,comment-id=00070002,timestamp=2016-12-13T04:13:40.503+0000)
>
> You mean...
> 
> There's no light at the end of the Bronze Tunnel?

I miss bronze, my team was dumb but so were my enemies.
Depends on how deep you are in bronze. I've... spectated some games. 50% cdr...crit mages...multiple kinds of boots...I hope my friend is alright.

People say Silver IV is the place you get stuck at.

People also say Platinum is worse than Silver.

Platinum IV on the other hand..

I still remember.

Bronze 5-2 when season starts is the most aids thing you will ever experience. I agree Plat 4 is bad but holy shit you haven't seen the worst of LoL community until you experienced 5-2 bronze after season opens up. At least the career bronze players knew what the fuck they were doing when they trolled.

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TEvWIEW1,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2016-12-13T04:01:31.763+0000)
>
> Bronze 5-2 when season starts is the most aids thing you will ever experience. I agree Plat 4 is bad but holy shit you haven't seen the worst of LoL community until you experienced 5-2 bronze after season opens up. At least the career bronze players knew what the fuck they were doing when they trolled.

I remember start of season Silver 5 0 LP, it's worse than any horror you could think of, even Kshaway's Wood Divisions Adventures seem decent compared to those boosted players.

Well due to my awful placements, I'm stuck in S2 till I get my act together.

You don't know what a magical land Silver elo can be until you see an AP Tahm Kench shit on an Orianna in mid lane.
Yasuos losing lane to twisted fates?
Read this in {{champion:161}}'s voice. It makes it MUCH better.

This

This is what was missing from my life

http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/tim-and-eric-mind-blown.gif
I honestly think in VK's voice every now and then, my main has such a perfect VO

report from bronze: the behavior of {{champion:157}} and {{champion:67}} has not changed. but there's one thing different: while {{champion:67}} keeps feeding and flaming, {{champion:157}} gets triples 1v5 even when behind. ADCs are turrets as they seem to be unable to attack and move at the same time. while this might have some consequences, champs like {{champion:222}} can still get a triple while being afk.
junglers are a bit too slow. the first gank happens at level 5, while the first drake is taken at min 23.
cs is just ignored. 
AI has better focus.
Intelligent life might be found here; need further investigation on "minions".

Gold V you say?
TRY DIAMOND 5
YOU WILL THANK GOD YOU SIT IN GOLD

Honestly {{item:3512}} is a bad item.

It causes the enemy minions to stop and because of that they continue to pile up to the point, that may the God have mercy on your tower, if you don't address it soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TEvWIEW1,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-12-12T20:01:04.638+0000)
>
> Honestly {{item:3512}} is a bad item.
> 
> It causes the enemy minions to stop and because of that they continue to pile up to the point, that may the God have mercy on your tower, if you don't address it soon.

 Well that can happen, but that's only if their wave is already piled up. Otherwise, zz'rot usually causes your waves to push, since the little minions it spawns do a lot of damage but don't have a lot of health.

> [{quoted}](name=Freddymc,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TEvWIEW1,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-12-12T20:17:23.229+0000)
>
> Well that can happen, but that's only if their wave is already piled up. Otherwise, zz'rot usually causes your waves to push, since the little minions it spawns do a lot of damage but don't have a lot of health.

{{item:3512}} It also farms for you like a pro, It usually ends up paying for itself by the end of the game :D

{{champion:74}} : hmm, don't mind if i do: {{item:3512}} {{item:3060}} {{item:2045}} 

this is some s5/6 meta, boys.

Bronze 4, day 6.

CS is ignored completely. Pushing lanes isn't a priority until everyone decides to group up and go straight down mid lane and keep kamikazi-ing into the enemy turret until it falls, you're wiped, or the enemy split pushes down a side lane and then everyone backs to chase them. After you win a lane, its your sworn duty to go to the other lanes and bring your lane with you, take that lanes cs, and accomplish nothing. You will not see the enemy jungler until end game or if they come to your lane to take some of your cs. When your lane roams your duty is to stay in your lane but stay under your turret and not attack theirs at all. God save you if you get an auto-filled support in this tier.

Welcome to hell, enjoy your ever lasting stay.

That's not exclusive to Gold V.  

Ironicaly, people seem to try harder in Bronze, but they just lack the ability or understanding to close out games. 

In Silver everyone just wants to be the hero (much like you have described).  By far it is the most chaotic tier I know of because there are legitimately good players that are climbing and then others that are just never going to improve because they are too stubborn or don't care.  

Gold is a vast wasteland of MMR boosted accounts, a few quality players, some feeders and trolls and they all typically end up in the same game somehow.

Bronze IV reporting in. Life is good down here, and the air is breathable. Sure, it is a mix of actual bronze and former silver,gold, and platinum primates....but they are amusing.

The drinks are cold and the fish in the river are biting. Come on down and watch the monkeys beat there chests at each other and run full-speed, head first into walls. At the end of the day, you can't help but laugh because while there is no intelligent life....there are also no fs given.

Huh...and here I am playing with bronze and silver players in my placements and rarely are people completely stupid. 

Salty, but no one is stupid yet.

Day 225 in designated sector "Unranked"

Assigned sector is....odd to say the least. Fauna seems to vary immensely, showing similarities to specimens found in sectors "Gold" and "Bronze" at times. 

At times, the fauna is capable of communication amongst themselves, showing coordination in action and developing strategies to adapt to threats. They have been observed collecting the maximum of the "Creep Score" resource as possible without hindering the community, and erecting crude observation  devices "codename: ward {{item:3340}}" to monitor key areas of the territory from safety, while destroying similar devices placed by their predators. 

However, it appears that despite this show of intelligence that would be a clear boon if encouraged to grow, there is an overwhelming popularity of subjects {{champion:67}} and {{champion:157}} in this sector. The abundance of subjects results in the destruction of teams as a result of refusal to coordinate with team for reasons stated as "stfu %%%got" and "stfu you suck, I'm pro" (Note: rough translation, full translation impossible due to language bond being absent) As a result, the community dynamic is destroyed and the area dissovles into aggressive shows of dominance to claim "top" "mid" "adc" and "JG" territories, while those who fail to be dominant are forced into the undervalued "supp" territory. These subjects, despite attempting to rally the team together, are ignored in favor of the pursuit of addictive substance known as "KDA" and "S-rank"

In seems that because of these harsh environmental conditions, the subjects managing to migrate to other territories such as "Bronze" or "Silver" undergo two possible metamorphosis. Either they create hardened carapaces and lose function to communicate with other subjects, and subsequently remain oblivious to nearly subjects, or they enhance communication capabilities and communicate with nearby subjects in a variety of ways. One subject was observed being hostile and vitriolic to his community, while another's was observed to be constructive. Due to the unpredictable nature of the subjects, further study is required. It is fascinating to observe how subjects change when interacting.

This is Unranked Overvation reporting in. Further observation required. Requesting cooperation of Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Plat sectors to compare data.
After reading through this thread, I can only conclude that there is no intelligent life anywhere in League of Legends. TuT
Support mains love all those "good" adc's out there

Houston this is Bronze V *sshhhhkkkk* we have a problem . It appears intelligent life does not exist on any level in this territory *shhhkkkkk* Gold V, Plat II, and Bronze V all seems to be encountering similar results. Hope for climbing out of this trench looks bleak *over*
